name: Super SplashTube Bros.
description:
A physics-based fighting game where the characters are disguised versions of some cool Brazilian YouTubers. Choose your favorite YouTuber and fight to show who's the greatest.

This is a fighting game with 3D graphics but you can move in only two dimensions. It's super simple to play: just choose one out of the 8 available characters and go into a quest to beat all the others in their respective home arenas. To win a fight, simply push your opponent out of the arena.

Features

  • 8 amazing fighters (that you might know)
  • 8 epic battle arenas
  • A lot of ragdoll physics
  • Super simple controls: just walk, jump and punch (a lot)

Controls

  • WASD keys to move
  • F to punch (connect multiple attacks for combos)
  • Hold F to block attacks
  • Space bar to jump
